title: riot give us urf riot give us urf
body:
shut the hell up. urf will be coming more than once this year, so just being patient. remember pool party zac?

"omg rito gammzzzzz release pool party zac nao lawl! 1!1!!"

and then nobody gave a shit afterwards

this is not as big of a deal as it's being made out to be, 2 urfs will be more fun. stop acting like spoiled brats. go sign an urf petition, then cry your eyes out when you realise that it wont change anything.

replies.body:

>
> zed main tells well. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

please don't associate me with those inbreds

Faker = inbred?

So what are we, braindead scumfucks that should be gunned down on the streets like the degenerates we are?

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TfvAj9iP,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-03T07:29:41.176+0000)

> Faker = inbred?
> 
> So what are we, braindead scumfucks that should be gunned down on the streets like the degenerates we are?

yes. i made a thread a while back saying that exact thing.

nvm
